description.value: You gain a bite unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[piercing]]]{1d4 piercing damage}. Your bite is in the brawling group and has the finesse and unarmed traits. You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d3}[slashing]]]{1d3 slashing damage}. Your claw is in the brawling group and has the agile and unarmed traits. You gain the @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-actions.iik40u8HhUs7wL9r]{Plains Strike} action.
